document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">whiter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Indian </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Pipe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">dimmer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Lace </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">stature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Fog </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">approach </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">place </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">voice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">imply </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">intimate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">spirit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">doth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">accost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">function </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">hath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Air? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">limitless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Hyperbole </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Drama </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Hypothesis </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Tragedy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Tis whiter than an Indian pipe
